quote: My mission in life is not merely to survive, but to thrive; and to do so with some passion, some compassion, some humor, and some style.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: A day without laughter is a day wasted.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: Smiling is definitely one of the best beauty remedies. If you have a good sense of humor and a good approach to life, that's beautiful.
author: Rashida Jones

quote: I love a man with a great sense of humor and who is intelligent - a man who has a great smile. He has to make me laugh. I like a man who is very ambitious and driven and who has a good heart and makes me feel safe. I like a man who is very strong and independent and confident - that is very sexy - but at the same time, he's very kind to people.
author: Nicole Scherzinger

quote: Your attitude is like a box of crayons that color your world. Constantly color your picture gray, and your picture will always be bleak. Try adding some bright colors to the picture by including humor, and your picture begins to lighten up.
author: Allen Klein

quote: Like a welcome summer rain, humor may suddenly cleanse and cool the earth, the air and you.
author: Langston Hughes

quote: Everything is funny, as long as it's happening to somebody else.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Start every day off with a smile and get it over with.
author: W. C. Fields

quote: There is a thin line that separates laughter and pain, comedy and tragedy, humor and hurt.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: Be strong, believe in freedom and in God, love yourself, understand your sexuality, have a sense of humor, masturbate, don't judge people by their religion, color or sexual habits, love life and your family.
author: Madonna Ciccone

quote: From there to here, and here to there, funny things are everywhere.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: Laughter is an instant vacation.
author: Milton Berle

quote: Comedy is simply a funny way of being serious.
author: Peter Ustinov

quote: The most wasted of all days is one without laughter.
author: e. e. cummings

quote: Humor is mankind's greatest blessing.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Everywhere is within walking distance if you have the time.
author: Steven Wright

quote: Most comedy is based on getting a laugh at somebody else's expense. And I find that that's just a form of bullying in a major way. So I want to be an example that you can be funny and be kind, and make people laugh without hurting somebody else's feelings.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: My childhood, adolescence and high school days are unusually important. If there has ever been a time that I developed a uniqueness and sense of humor and the ability to organize, it was then. In those early days, I developed the skills that gave me a certain degree of success in American politics.
author: Lee Atwater

quote: Laughter is the closest distance between two people.
author: Victor Borge

quote: Kindness and a generous spirit go a long way. And a sense of humor. It's like medicine - very healing.
author: Max Irons

quote: If I had no sense of humor, I would long ago have committed suicide.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: I love people who make me laugh. I honestly think it's the thing I like most, to laugh. It cures a multitude of ills. It's probably the most important thing in a person.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: My life is part humor, part roses, part thorns.
author: Bret Michaels

quote: I think the sexiest thing about a woman is confidence, but confidence in a humble way, not in an arrogant way. Sense of humor is definitely important. And sunglasses always hide a multitude of sins. Sunglasses and a great pair of heels can turn most outfits around.
author: Victoria Beckham

quote: I realize that humor isn't for everyone. It's only for people who want to have fun, enjoy life, and feel alive.
author: Anne Wilson Schaef

quote: I don't need someone with a hot body. He can be fat or overweight and have a belly. It's very much about style and substance and humor, interest, curiosity and really being smart.
author: Kate Walsh

quote: If we went by the world's definition of who I'm supposed to be because I look weird... 'Well, surely, this guy can't have a productive life, surely, he doesn't have a sense of humor. Surely, he can't love life.' We stereotype people in this world. And so... if the world thinks you're not good enough, it's a lie, you know. Get a second opinion.
author: Nick Vujicic

quote: Humor is laughing at what you haven't got when you ought to have it.
author: Langston Hughes

quote: I believe that singing is the key to long life, a good figure, a stable temperament, increased intelligence, new friends, super self-confidence, heightened sexual attractiveness, and a better sense of humor.
author: Brian Eno

quote: Good humor is a tonic for mind and body. It is the best antidote for anxiety and depression. It is a business asset. It attracts and keeps friends. It lightens human burdens. It is the direct route to serenity and contentment.
author: Grenville Kleiser

quote: I am attracted to intelligence, a witty sense of humor, an adventurous outlook on life and spiritual awareness about one's self and the world.
author: Tanit Phoenix

quote: There are different kinds of humor, some is sarcastic, some introspective. Introspective fit my personality better.
author: Rita Rudner

quote: Putting a little time aside for clean fun and good humor is very necessary to relieve the tensions of our time.
author: Hattie McDaniel

quote: In the household in which I was raised, the themes were pretty simple. 'Work hard. Don't quit. Be appreciative, be thankful, be grateful, be respectful. Also, never whine, never complain. And always, for crying out loud, keep a sense of humor.'
author: Michael Keaton

quote: You're not going to see my sense of humor on the football field. That's not a place for me to joke around.
author: Tom Brady

quote: It's your outlook on life that counts. If you take yourself lightly and don't take yourself too seriously, pretty soon you can find the humor in our everyday lives. And sometimes it can be a lifesaver.
author: Betty White

quote: Celebrate your successes. Find some humor in your failures.
author: Sam Walton

quote: As a person, he was wonderful. He really was a great person. He was full of life. He had a great sense of humor. Very talented, of course, but very caring to his parents. There was a very endearing quality about Elvis.
author: Priscilla Presley

quote: Our subconscious minds have no sense of humor, play no jokes and cannot tell the difference between reality and an imagined thought or image. What we continually think about eventually will manifest in our lives.
author: Robert Collier

quote: I think the scariest person in the world is the person with no sense of humor.
author: Michael J. Fox

quote: What a newspaper needs in its news, in its headlines, and on its editorial page is terseness, humor, descriptive power, satire, originality, good literary style, clever condensation, and accuracy, accuracy, accuracy!
author: Joseph Pulitzer

quote: A person without a sense of humor is like a wagon without springs. It's jolted by every pebble on the road.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Our brand of democracy is hard. But I can promise that a year from now, when I no longer hold this office, I'll be right there with you as a citizen - inspired by those voices of fairness and vision, of grit and good humor and kindness that have helped America travel so far.
author: Barack Obama

quote: One of the things that binds us as a family is a shared sense of humor.
author: Ralph Fiennes

quote: Honestly, I like someone who is really grounded, super sweet, honest. I need them to have a sense of humor. I need them to laugh at what's funny, I need them to get jokes and be funny and be witty and sarcastic.
author: Casper Smart

quote: Transparency, honesty, kindness, good stewardship, even humor, work in businesses at all times.
author: John Gerzema

quote: It's good to be able to laugh at yourself and the problems you face in life. Sense of humor can save you.
author: Margaret Cho

quote: We are, in the comics, the last frontier of good, wholesome family humor and entertainment.
author: Bil Keane

quote: I love a girl with a sense of humor. Someone who can make me laugh and that I can get along with and talk with and who is just sweet overall, inside and out.
author: Logan Henderson

quote: A well-developed sense of humor is the pole that adds balance to your steps as you walk the tightrope of life.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: A good actor is someone who knows how to take the part and make it real and make it honest and be effective in it. If it's in a funny movie and, as long as they are cast in an appropriate way, humor will come from it.
author: Ivan Reitman

quote: Good planning is important. I've also regarded a sense of humor as one of the most important things on a big expedition. When you're in a difficult or dangerous situation, or when you're depressed about the chances of success, someone who can make you laugh eases the tension.
author: Edmund Hillary

quote: Humor is emotional chaos remembered in tranquility.
author: James Thurber

quote: Humor comes from self-confidence.
author: Rita Mae Brown

quote: I'm not funny. What I am is brave.
author: Lucille Ball

quote: A strong sense of humor, a really awesome personality, and maturity is also really important in a boyfriend. I tend to only be attracted to older guys for that reason. I just love guys who have a really strong sense of who they are.
author: Elizabeth Gillies

quote: Humor is not a mood but a way of looking at the world. So if it is correct to say that humor was stamped out in Nazi Germany, that does not mean that people were not in good spirits, or anything of that sort, but something much deeper and more important.
author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quote: I think that humor is part of what saves us from despair.
author: John Perry Barlow

quote: Try to find someone with a sense of humor. That's an important thing to have because when you get into an argument, one of the best ways to diffuse it is to be funny. You don't want to hide away from a point, because some points are serious, but you'd rather have a discussion that was a discussion, rather than an argument.
author: Ed Sheeran

quote: The secret to humor is surprise.
author: Aristotle

quote: Confidence is at the root of so many attractive qualities, a sense of humor, a sense of style, a willingness to be who you are no matter what anyone else might think or say and it's true, I do have a certain fondness for women that have dark hair.
author: Wentworth Miller

quote: A sense of humor... is needed armor. Joy in one's heart and some laughter on one's lips is a sign that the person down deep has a pretty good grasp of life.
author: Hugh Sidey

quote: Humor is an antidote to all ills.
author: Patch Adams

quote: When humor can be made to alternate with melancholy, one has a success, but when the same things are funny and melancholic at the same time, it's just wonderful.
author: Francois Truffaut

quote: A man's man is respectful, he's honorable, he's loyal, he's sensitive, he's strong, he's tough, he's well-groomed, he has a sense of humor - and he takes care of himself and his lady.
author: Frank Vincent

quote: I have seen what a laugh can do. It can transform almost unbearable tears into something bearable, even hopeful.
author: Bob Hope

quote: My favorite kind of humor is basically, if it was happening to you, it wouldn't be funny, but to observe it, it's hilarious.
author: Bill Burr

quote: Great men are rarely isolated mountain peaks; they are the summits of ranges.
author: Thomas W. Higginson

quote: I don't think it's possible to have a sense of tragedy without having a sense of humor.
author: Christopher Hitchens

quote: My legacy would be that you don't have to give up anything. You can be chic but have a sense of humor, you can be sexy but comfortable, you can be timeless but fresh.
author: Michael Kors

quote: The more I live, the more I think that humor is the saving sense.
author: Jacob Riis

quote: I met Woz when I was 13, at a friend's garage. He was about 18. He was, like, the first person I met who knew more electronics than I did at that point. We became good friends, because we shared an interest in computers and we had a sense of humor. We pulled all kinds of pranks together.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: A little perspective, like a little humor, goes a long way.
author: Allen Klein

quote: People with a sense of humor tend to be less egocentric and more realistic in their view of the world and more humble in moments of success and less defeated in times of travail.
author: Bob Newhart

quote: Humor and laughter - not necessarily derogatory derision - are my pet tools. This may come from my general philosophy of never taking the world too seriously - for fear of dying of boredom.
author: Marcel Duchamp

quote: You can defeat fear through humor, through pain, through honesty, bravery, intuition, and through love in the truest sense.
author: John Cassavetes

quote: Humor is everywhere in that there's irony in just about anything a human does.
author: Bill Nye

quote: Humor starts like a wildfire, but then continues on, smoldering, smoldering for years.
author: Robert Orben

quote: You are not angry with people when you laugh at them. Humor teaches tolerance.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: Humor must not professedly teach and it must not professedly preach, but it must do both if it would live forever.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Analyzing humor is like dissecting a frog. Few people are interested and the frog dies of it.
author: E. B. White

quote: OK, in all seriousness, I would say I couldn't be in a relationship without equality, generosity, integrity, spirit, kindness and humor. And awesomeness.
author: Jennifer Aniston

quote: Sometimes I used to think to myself, 'Have I lost a sense of humor?' but I don't think that I have. I think one can be as snarky and sarcastic as lots of people, but I have never found that it makes me particularly happy.
author: Kenneth Branagh

quote: We get to live in a time that we get to use social media as a tool. It's not just a face on a piece of paper, and that's what makes you someone's favorite model. We can have a very similar sense of humor as someone, and that's why we're their favorite model, or our personal style, off the runway, is why we're their favorite.
author: Gigi Hadid

quote: Humor has become so cliche and boring that nothing's funny anymore unless it involves something totally disgusting that offends somebody or makes them feel really uncomfortable.
author: Tom DeLonge

quote: On April 3, 2014, Jane Goodall turned 80. The iconic blond ponytail has gone gray, but the sparkle of intelligence, sly humor, and fierce dedication still shines from her hazel eyes.
author: David Quammen

quote: There is a collective as well as an individual humor inclining peoples to sadness or cheerfulness, making them see things in bright or somber lights. In fact, only society can pass a collective opinion on the value of human life; for this the individual is incompetent.
author: Emile Durkheim

quote: People of humor are always in some degree people of genius.
author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: There are two insults no human being will endure: that he has no sense of humor, and that he has never known trouble.
author: Sinclair Lewis

quote: You write the way you think about the world. My motto in times of trouble - and I'm speaking of life, not writing - is 'no humor too black.'
author: Elizabeth McCracken

quote: Gags die, humor doesn't.
author: Jack Benny

quote: It's how you define yourself. It's not Nirvana or Pearl Jam: it's, 'Do you watch 'Portlandia' or 'Amy Schumer'?' It relates to a specific sense of humor. And, 'Do you know the hidden gems?' Like, if you knew the Pixies in the '80s.
author: Jonathan Krisel

quote: My platform has been to reach reluctant readers. And one of the best ways I found to motivate them is to connect them with reading that interests them, to expand the definition of reading to include humor, science fiction/fantasy, nonfiction, graphic novels, wordless books, audio books and comic books.
author: Jon Scieszka

quote: Maybe there's a chance to get back to grown-up films. Anything that uses humor and dramatic values to deal with human emotions and gets down to what people are to people.
author: Robert Altman

quote: It's always funny until someone gets hurt. Then it's just hilarious.
author: Bill Hicks

quote: A sense of humor is a major defense against minor troubles.
author: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: You've got to have a sense of humor to keep your sanity.
author: Lance Bass

quote: Keeping an active mind has been vital to my survival, as has been maintaining a sense of humor.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: Absurdity is what I like most in life, and there's humor in struggling in ignorance. If you saw a man repeatedly running into a wall until he was a bloody pulp, after a while it would make you laugh because it becomes absurd.
author: David Lynch

quote: The secret source of humor is not joy but sorrow; there is no humor in Heaven.
author: Mark Twain

quote: A woman has to be intelligent, have charm, a sense of humor, and be kind. It's the same qualities I require from a man.
author: Catherine Deneuve

quote: I grew up as a very sarcastic person. I was always the class clown, and to date girls, I had to be really funny. I was really skinny growing up. I was so thin, I had to run around in the shower to get wet. That kind of thin. So I always had to rely on humor and sarcasm.
author: Kurt Fuller

quote: I have never believed much in luck, and my sense of humor has tended to walk on the dark side.
author: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: I wasn't shy, but I was really hyper. Nobody got my sense of humor. I was a black skater kid.
author: Tyler, The Creator

quote: I want someone who can keep me on my toes, has a good sense of humor and a good heart.
author: Carmen Electra

quote: Don't wish me happiness - I don't expect to be happy it's gotten beyond that, somehow. Wish me courage and strength and a sense of humor - I will need them all.
author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: Everybody's got a different sense of humor. It's just different styles.
author: Colin Quinn

quote: The problem with having a sense of humor is often that people you use it on aren't in a very good mood.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: Common sense and a sense of humor are the same thing, moving at different speeds. A sense of humor is just common sense, dancing.
author: Clive James

quote: Humour is the weapon of unarmed people: it helps people who are oppressed to smile at the situation that pains them.
author: Simon Wiesenthal

quote: Humor is reason gone mad.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: I'll speak for myself, but there's a lot of humor to be found in sarcasm and darkness. You talk to any paramedic, they survive by developing a pretty off-kilter sense of humor.
author: Nicolas Cage

quote: A sense of humor is good for you. Have you ever heard of a laughing hyena with heart burn?
author: Bob Hope

quote: Humor is something that thrives between man's aspirations and his limitations. There is more logic in humor than in anything else. Because, you see, humor is truth.
author: Victor Borge

quote: Humor is by far the most significant activity of the human brain.
author: Edward de Bono

quote: A pun is the lowest form of humor, unless you thought of it yourself.
author: Doug Larson

quote: I think kids want the same thing from a book that adults want - a fast-paced story, characters worth caring about, humor, surprises, and mystery. A good book always keeps you asking questions, and makes you keep turning pages so you can find out the answers.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: Everyone is flailing through this life without an owner's manual, with whatever modicum of grace and good humor we can manage.
author: Anne Lamott

quote: Anyone who's married to Mariah Carey - I'm pretty sure - doesn't have a great sense of humor. I mean, let's be honest: she's ridiculous. What is her game plan?
author: Chelsea Handler

quote: Imagination was given to man to compensate him for what he isn't. A sense of humor was provided to console him for what he is.
author: Horace Walpole

quote: When humor goes, there goes civilization.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: It is quite true, as some poets said, that the God who created man must have had a sinister sense of humor, creating him a reasonable being, yet forcing him to take this ridiculous posture, and driving him with blind craving for this ridiculous performance.
author: D. H. Lawrence

quote: When humor works, it works because it's clarifying what people already feel. It has to come from someplace real.
author: Tina Fey

quote: I am a candid interview and I have a dark and dry sense of humor - a very Canadian sense of humor and I am only learning now stupidly that you can't read tongue. When I say something funny in a newspaper and I meant it to be funny, it doesn't read that way.
author: Michael Buble

quote: Humor is my default mode.
author: John Updike

quote: Cynicism is humor in ill health.
author: H. G. Wells

quote: My view of life is colored by humor and looking at the best in any situation.
author: Michael J. Fox

quote: All my humor is based on destruction and despair. If the whole world were tranquil, without disease and violence, I'd be standing in the bread line - right in back of J. Edgar Hoover.
author: Lenny Bruce

quote: Humor is one of the best ingredients of survival.
author: Aung San Suu Kyi

quote: There are so many things to talk about between black people, Hispanic people, white people, gay people, men, women, it's all based on fear. We all have fears, this thing that stops us from embracing as we are one. We are never going to be one. People are messed up, but humor lets us see how ignorant we can be.
author: Marlon Wayans

quote: The key to humor is often self-loathing or sarcasm. In a sense, that's how self-loathing is made palatable.
author: James Gray

quote: I think people are sexy when they have a sense of humor, when they are smart, when they have some sense of style, when they are kind, when they express their own opinions, when they are creative, when they have character.
author: Suzanne Vega

quote: Humor has bailed me out of more tight situations than I can think of. If you go with your instincts and keep your humor, creativity follows. With luck, success comes, too.
author: Jimmy Buffett

quote: Good humor is one of the best articles of dress one can wear in society.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: Sometimes the only way to deal with horrific things in life is through a dark sense of humor.
author: Margaret Cho

quote: When I teach the formal curriculum, I have the chance to think about it ahead of time. I can rehearse it. I can illustrate it with self-deprecating humor and humble-sounding personal disclosure. I can try to make it comes out just right.
author: John Ortberg

quote: Humor does not rescue us from unhappiness, but enables us to move back from it a little.
author: Mason Cooley

quote: People who have any kind of illness use humor as a type of coping.
author: Edward Zwick

quote: Humor is the ability to see three sides to one coin.
author: Ned Rorem

quote: I have great respect for my parents. I got such beautiful things from both of them. It doesn't mean that we didn't have our rough times, but they were remarkable people who were open-minded, creative and hard-working, and had great senses of humor.
author: Patti Smith

quote: They say you don't want to meet your heroes, but those two guys, you do want to meet them, because they do not disappoint. Walken has this amazing sense of humor, and Pacino is like just a sweetheart of a guy.
author: Bill Burr

quote: I think people appreciate a songwriter who shows different sides. The whole angst thing is cool, but if that's all you've got, it's just boring. Everything I write, whether it's happy or sad, has a sense of humor to it.
author: Katy Perry

quote: There's something very authentic about humor, when you think about it. Anybody can pretend to be serious. But you can't pretend to be funny.
author: Billy Collins

quote: I quite like dark humor.
author: Marina and the Diamonds

quote: Total absence of humor renders life impossible.
author: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette

quote: Wit is an explosion of the compound spirit.
author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

quote: The whole ability to look at the complexity of race and any sort of associated -ism and still find humor, that's a very interesting space.
author: Rashid Johnson

quote: I'm not a traditional politician, and I have a sense of humor. I'll try to soften it and become boring, maybe even very boring, but I'm not sure if I'll be able to.
author: Silvio Berlusconi

quote: This is a feminist bookstore. There is no humor section.
author: John Callahan

quote: Wit is the lowest form of humor.
author: Alexander Pope

quote: Racial humor was about 35% of my act when I first started. But I realized that it was a crutch. What brought it home was when another comedian said to me, 'If you changed color tomorrow, you wouldn't have any material.' He meant it as a put-down, but I took it as a challenge.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: I think at its best the American sense of humor is the same as the British sense of humor at its best, which is to be wry and ironic and self deprecating.
author: Simon Pegg

quote: Political correctness? In my humor, I never talk about politics. I was never much into all that.
author: Don Rickles

quote: Working on newspapers, you're writing to a certain length, often very brief pieces; you tend to look for easy forms of humor - women can't drive, things like that. That's about the level of a lot of newspaper humor. It becomes a form of laziness.
author: Tom Wolfe

quote: A lot of people say, 'Hey, God doesn't have a sense of humor.' Yes, He does. God has a great sense of humor.
author: Si Robertson

quote: The thing that makes 'Dirty Jobs' different is that it's one of the few shows that portrays work in a way that doesn't highlight the drudgery. Instead, it highlights the humor.
author: Mike Rowe

quote: I was certainly not a class clown; I confused and angered a lot of people with my sense of humor.
author: Katherine Ryan

quote: In rough times, pathfinders rely on work, friends, humor and prayer. They develop a support network.
author: Gail Sheehy

quote: I do talk about celebrity relationships like Kim Kardashian's. I like to find the humor in love.
author: Loni Love

quote: Humor is the only way to tell a story. Especially the dark ones.
author: Lisa Lutz

quote: Funny songs aren't usually that good. Like Weird Al and maybe a couple of Beatles songs, but it's kind of hard to bring humor into rock music in an interesting way.
author: Win Butler

quote: Humor is always based on a modicum of truth. Have you ever heard a joke about a father-in-law?
author: Dick Clark

quote: In sitcoms, the women are so beautiful, understanding and well-bred. They have humor, but sort of display it with a twinkle of the eye and not a guffaw. But there's no juice in that for me.
author: Bea Arthur

quote: You know, I'm Australian, and we have got the worst sense of humor. We are cruel to each other.
author: Steve Irwin

quote: I wore goofy hats to school and did musical theater. Most people thought I was a dork. But if you have a sense of humor about it, no one can bring you down.
author: Zac Efron

quote: Do feminists have a sense of humor? Yes.
author: Gloria Allred

quote: Be fun! I don't like homes or rooms that don't have a sense of humor or have some sense of whimsy or a personality. Your home should reflect who you are, and what you love. I would never have something in my home because it's the thing to have. I have to love it and it needs some connection to me.
author: Bryan Batt

quote: The first ingredient in conversation is truth, the next good sense, the third good humor, and the fourth wit.
author: William Temple

quote: Everybody I know who is funny, it's in them. You can teach timing, or some people are able to tell a joke, though I don't like to tell jokes. But I think you have to be born with a sense of humor and a sense of timing.
author: Carol Burnett

quote: People who know me, they know I have a sense of humor, I'm a bit of a joker, a bit of a clown really, and I would love someone to exploit that side of me and send me a romantic comedy.
author: Gary Oldman

quote: Kindness is really important to me in finding my own prince - so are patience and a sense of humor. Without those qualities he's no Prince Charming!
author: Anne Hathaway

quote: Good humor is the health of the soul, sadness is its poison.
author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield

quote: Imagination was given to man to compensate him for what he is not; a sense of humor to console him for what he is.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: You can't study comedy; it's within you. It's a personality. My humor is an attitude.
author: Don Rickles

quote: If you're feeling blue, lock yourself in a room, stand in front of a mirror, and dance - and laugh at yourself and be sexy. Dance the silliest and ugliest you've ever danced. Make fun of yourself and try to recover your sense of humor.
author: Salma Hayek

quote: I could not tread these perilous paths in safety, if I did not keep a saving sense of humor.
author: Horatio Nelson

quote: I'm a sarcastic person, and people don't get my humor sometimes.
author: Sarah Hyland

quote: If you can get humor and seriousness at the same time, you've created a special little thing, and that's what I'm looking for, because if you get pompous, you lose everything.
author: Paul Simon

quote: You may not be able to change a situation, but with humor you can change your attitude about it.
author: Allen Klein

quote: You can find heroism everyday, like guys working terrible jobs because they've got to support their families. Or as far as humor, the things I see on the job, on the street, are far funnier than anything you'll ever see on TV.
author: Harvey Pekar

quote: Keep your sense of humor, my friend; if you don't have a sense of humor it just isn't funny anymore.
author: Wavy Gravy

quote: Dad needs to show an incredible amount of respect and humor and friendship toward his mate so the kids understand their parents are sexy, they're fun, they do things together, they're best friends. Kids learn by example. If I respect Mom, they're going to respect Mom.
author: Tim Allen

quote: A book without potty humor is like a banana split without hot fudge. It can still be good, I suppose, but you kinda get the feeling that something is missing.
author: Dav Pilkey

quote: In prehistoric times, mankind often had only two choices in crisis situations: fight or flee. In modern times, humor offers us a third alternative; fight, flee - or laugh.
author: Robert Orben

quote: Someone asked me what the key to being a good frontman was, and I think having a sense of humor about it is pretty near the top of that list. It's a very strange place to be in, and I don't take that role too seriously.
author: Alex Turner

quote: I do find the sibling connection endlessly fascinating, as I do all family dynamics. I like how siblings seem to create their own parentless mini-civilization within a family, one that has its own laws, myths, language, humor, its own loyalties and treacheries.
author: Jandy Nelson

quote: Everything human is pathetic. The secret source of humor itself is not joy but sorrow. There is no humor in heaven.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The ultimate storyteller is Shakespeare, who was able to get the 'groundlings' to laugh at his bawdy humor and storylines but could still be studied by scholars to this day for the complexity of his language, meter, and symbolism. That's the real guy.
author: Jon Favreau

quote: I hang out with the 'nerdy' people - they have a different sense of humor than most kids.
author: Liam Aiken

quote: In truth, politeness is artificial good humor, it covers the natural want of it, and ends by rendering habitual a substitute nearly equivalent to the real virtue.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Poor David Hume is dying fast, but with more real cheerfulness and good humor and with more real resignation to the necessary course of things, than any whining Christian ever dyed with pretended resignation to the will of God.
author: Adam Smith

quote: What I wrote all the time when I was a kid - I don't want to call it 'poetry,' because it wasn't poetry. I was not that kind of a writer. I was a rhymer. I was a fan of Dorothy Parker's, so maybe I wrote poetry to that extent, but my main focus was the humor of it, and word construction, and the slant. Your words, it's a very powerful experience.
author: Carrie Fisher

quote: Humor is very interesting to me. My films are not comedies, but there's comedy in them from time to time, absurdities, just like in real life.
author: David Lynch

quote: The duty of comedy is to correct men by amusing them.
author: Moliere

quote: Honest good humor is the oil and wine of a merry meeting, and there is no jovial companionship equal to that where the jokes are rather small and laughter abundant.
author: Washington Irving

quote: What a strange world this would be if we all had the same sense of humor.
author: Bernard Williams

quote: Humor is the truth; wit is an exaggeration of the truth.
author: Stan Laurel

quote: Congratulations, you have a sense of humor. And to those who didn't: Go stick your head in the mud.
author: Jesse Ventura

quote: Always have a sense of humor about life - you'll need it - but always be courteous to boot.
author: Peter Jennings

quote: I think, in our darkest moments, you have to find the humor, and you have to find the lightness.
author: Corey Hawkins

quote: If you could choose one characteristic that would get you through life, choose a sense of humor.
author: Jennifer Jones

quote: It's a funny old world.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: Wit - the salt with which the American humorist spoils his intellectual cookery by leaving it out.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Now, Richard Pryor was unique. Many misunderstood his humor. He lit up the hallway, but they didn't understand his use of profanity. He didn't use it just to be using it; he used it in the context of his satire.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: I like a man who can be a real friend, has a good sense of humor, a good pair of shoes and a healthy gold card.
author: Victoria Beckham

quote: Humor, for me, is really a gate of departure. It's a way of enticing a reader into a poem so that less funny things can take place later. It really is not an end in itself, but a means to an end.
author: Billy Collins

quote: I've always thought my strengths were I'm smart, and I have a good sense of humor. I definitely struggle with feeling confident.
author: Lauren Graham

quote: It's always the girl comedy and the guy comedy. It bums me out. You'd think there'd be a progression, from James L. Brooks and Nora Ephron into more subtle humor and behavior and psychology. All these interesting things people can learn about themselves by watching talented writers comment intelligently on someone else's emotional life.
author: Parker Posey

quote: I've got a sense of humor. I'm a funny guy.
author: Daryl Hall

quote: I think being funny is not anyone's first choice.
author: Woody Allen

quote: In a way, a lot of my humor comes from presenting things that are dramatic or shocking and then people not having socially appropriate responses, having people denying the drama by failing to react to it, and that's a really classic form of humor.
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: I love Stephen Colbert and Jon Stewart because they're bringing irony back into American humor, which is a delicious treat. The entire Colbert persona of being extreme right-wing when he's not at all is highly amusing. He does it so well, but sometimes a little too well. My wife is convinced he's completely that way.
author: John Lydon

quote: What we're doing is fun - if you have any sense of humor at all!
author: Calvin Klein

quote: Twitter is the place where I try to be more funny. And then I use Instagram just as my diary. I pull some jokes on there, but I think people have a better sense of humor on Twitter.
author: Gigi Hadid

quote: Well, the most terrible fear that anybody should have is not war, is not a disease, not cancer or heart problems or food poisoning - it's a man or a woman without a sense of humor.
author: Jonathan Winters

quote: Get well cards have become so humorous that if you don't get sick you're missing half the fun.
author: Flip Wilson

quote: People are wired for lots of things. We're wired for novelty. We're wired for humor. We're wired for new pieces of information that surprise us in some way or add value to our lives. We're wired for fear.
author: Ramez Naam

quote: I will say that as I get older and calmer and quieter in my own self, the one quality in a woman that I find more and more attractive is kindness. A sense of adventure and humor is important too, but I truly find kindness and consideration for others to be the most attractive thing in anyone.
author: Colin Farrell

quote: Basically, I think you need two things to get by in this world: a sense of humor and the ability to laugh when your ego is destroyed.
author: Arlo Guthrie

quote: I'm interested in humor, and greeting cards just happen to be a perfect medium for my message. They're accessible to everyone, and thanks to all the advances that have been made by environmentally conscientious printers, I can get my message across while keeping my carbon footprint relatively small.
author: Anne Taintor

quote: There are men so philosophical that they can see humor in their own toothaches. But there has never lived a man so philosophical that he could see the toothache in his own humor.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: If you are a small company taking on a big company, you need to have a sense of humor.
author: Richard Branson

quote: And I would be the first to admit that probably, in a lot of press conferences over the time that I have been in coaching, indulging my own sense of humor at press conferences has not been greatly to my benefit.
author: Bobby Knight

quote: I definitely need a girl that has a good sense of humor because there are some girls that are just very uptight.
author: Romeo Santos

quote: I love practical jokes and humor. That there's frankly no joke that I don't think is funny. I love practical jokes, but I don't like being scared.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: Poop humor is fun. If you do the toilet scenes well and commit to them, they can be really, really powerful.
author: Sandra Bullock

quote: In conversation, humor is worth more than wit and easiness more than knowledge.
author: George Herbert

quote: I have a need to always make people laugh. I have a desperate need. I love a great sense of humor. The people I sort of surround myself with have that.
author: Peter Dinklage

quote: I love dry British humor. I love to sketch in my off time. I love tequila.
author: Maren Morris

quote: Humor is such a wonderful thing, helping you realize what a fool you are but how beautiful that is at the same time.
author: Lynda Barry

quote: Humor is the affectionate communication of insight.
author: Leo Rosten

quote: My sense of humor often gets me in trouble.
author: Duncan Jones

quote: Humor is the instinct for taking pain playfully.
author: Max Eastman

quote: Okay, sense of humor: plus one. Being able to laugh at yourself: plus one. Being able to laugh at other people without being mean: plus one. Vanity: minus one.
author: Katie Aselton

quote: I like beautiful writing, pain, unexpected humor, and the message that, at the last second, people are going to be kind to each other. It almost doesn't matter what the genre is.
author: Jeff Giles

quote: I think I'm too cynical for L.A. My sense of humor doesn't go down well here, which probably affects my love life. I need to have a laugh track following me around so people know I'm trying to be funny.
author: Teddy Thompson

quote: My humor is my creativity, and my skepticism is a gift.
author: J. Tillman

quote: Improv changed my life in the best way. I gained so much confidence and really learned how to use my sense of humor to do something other than make sarcastic comments to the TV, though that remains one of my best skills. I stayed in Chicago for college mainly to continue doing improv, which was an awesome decision for me.
author: Lauren Lapkus

quote: I believe that economists put decimal points in their forecasts to show they have a sense of humor.
author: William Gilmore Simms

quote: Humor, humility, and, of course, honesty, all are qualities that work in public and cultural diplomacy.
author: Cynthia P. Schneider

quote: The overwhelming majority of Americans are possessed of two great qualities a sense of humor and a sense of proportion.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Anybody with a sense of humor is going to put on my album and laugh from beginning to end.
author: Eminem

quote: I am often the brunt of my own humor.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: In some sort of crude sense, which no vulgarity, no humor, no overstatement can quite extinguish, the physicists have known sin; and this is a knowledge which they cannot lose.
author: J. Robert Oppenheimer

quote: Men are happy to be laughed at for their humor, but not for their folly.
author: Jonathan Swift

quote: I can imagine no more comfortable frame of mind for the conduct of life than a humorous resignation.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: Impropriety is the soul of wit.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: Nothing like a little judicious levity.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: We can't understand when we're pregnant, or when our siblings are expecting, how profound it is to have a shared history with a younger generation: blood, genes, humor. It means we were actually here, on Earth, for a time - like the Egyptians with their pyramids, only with children.
author: Anne Lamott

quote: There is hope for the future because God has a sense of humor and we are funny to God.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: Among my friends, I'm not a little Boy Scout, and they love my humor, thank God.
author: Don Rickles

quote: We're all screwed up. And the way Christians mess things up is we act like we've got it going on. And if we would just stay in that place of, 'Hey, we're all screwed up and but for the grace of God, none of us have a shot here.' We need to have a sense of humor about it; that's kind of the way I've always faced my comedy.
author: Jeff Foxworthy

quote: Humor is just another defense against the universe.
author: Mel Brooks

quote: I hate to say it but I hate black humor. I feel like a Klan member saying it, but it's just not funny.
author: Issa Rae

quote: I should say, one of the things about being a widow or a widower, you really, really need a sense of humor, because everything's going to fall apart.
author: Joyce Carol Oates

quote: When I look at a lot of older stuff that I've written, I think one sign of amateur humor writing is when you see people trying too hard.
author: David Sedaris

quote: I think the next best thing to solving a problem is finding some humor in it.
author: Frank A. Clark

quote: The schizophrenic has no sense of humor. His world is a constantly daunting, unfriendly place.
author: Bob Newhart

quote: I'd probably describe my sense of humor as 'twisted,' I guess. It's not hard to make me laugh, especially when I'm surrounded by my close friends, especially my bandmates.
author: Mac DeMarco

quote: Let's not call physical comedy falling down and pratfalls. All humor is physical, no matter how you dish it out. It's timing, like a dancer or an athlete would have.
author: Chevy Chase

quote: My sense of humor is a turkey, and I pull it out of the oven and baste it in reality.
author: Tracy Morgan

quote: A woman who knows that she doesn't have to get all decked out to look good is sexy. A woman who can make you feel smart with her conversation skills is also sexy. I believe the sense of humor is important.
author: Benedict Cumberbatch

quote: It is characteristic of all deep human problems that they are not to be approached without some humor and some bewilderment.
author: Freeman Dyson

quote: I need a woman to have a quirky sense of humor. There's a bunch of jokes I use, and if she doesn't get them, she's probably not for me.
author: Matthew Perry

quote: Humor can be an incredible, lacerating and effective weapon.
author: Carl Hiaasen

quote: I defuse everything I can with it. Humor is such a great shield.
author: Brad Paisley

quote: I think probably the qualities that I look for in a man are somewhat different than they were before I became a public person, but not that much different. I think that, sort of, the element of trust is certainly much bigger for me, but the other things that - the other qualities, intelligence and kindness and sense of humor, those things.
author: Monica Lewinsky

quote: Well, darkness with humor... I'm not an extremely suicidal or sad person.
author: Peter Steele

quote: I don't understand how somebody wouldn't have a sense of humor about themselves.
author: John Malkovich

quote: Humor and seriousness are not in opposition to each other.
author: Al Franken

quote: Humor is perhaps a sense of intellectual perspective: an awareness that some things are really important, others not; and that the two kinds are most oddly jumbled in everyday affairs.
author: Christopher Morley

quote: The combination of landing the biggest interview of my career and having a drill in my back reminds me that God only gives us what we can handle and that it helps to have a good sense of humor when we run smack into the absurdity of life.
author: Robin Roberts

quote: Humor's an excellent way to make a point more palatable and/or relatable.
author: Jen Lancaster

quote: Bad humor is an evasion of reality; good humor is an acceptance of it.
author: Malcolm Muggeridge

quote: It felt as if things were literally slipping through my fingers. Things were just streaming away from me. I lost my sense of humor. I'm still looking for that.
author: Michelle Williams

quote: Laughter, and the broader category of humor, are key elements in helping us go on with our life after a loss.
author: Allen Klein

quote: In Australia, even the darkest subject matter has a little pinch of humor. A little sweet to make the sour go down.
author: Ben Mendelsohn

quote: My senior year of high school, I was voted 'Wittiest.' So, several years later, I decided to try my hand at writing humor to see if I could be witty enough to make some money.
author: Barbara Park

quote: Without a sense of humor, I would have been gone a long time ago.
author: Patty Duke

quote: Comedy is still alive, and there are still funny people. Jews are still overrepresented in comedy and psychiatry and underrepresented in the priesthood. That immigrant Jewish humor is still with us.
author: Robert Klein

quote: Somebody says, 'Do a Tom Bodett, a folksy kind of thing,' and it sounds like something out of 'Hee Haw,' very insulting. They turn wry humor into disparaging sarcasm, and you get what amounts to insulting advertising.
author: Tom Bodett

quote: Lucifer has a sense of fun about life; he just likes to play with people. But the sense of humor of the show is what makes the show entertaining as opposed to dark.
author: Tom Ellis

quote: My parents armed me with an amazing sense of humor, and it's what you need when, well, it's what anyone needs in this world.
author: Warwick Davis

quote: With reporting, if you work hard, you can usually pull something out. But writing humor doesn't respond to working hard, necessarily. I mean, you could just sit there and look at the page all day and maybe something will come.
author: Ian Frazier

quote: Any good humor is sophomoric. 'Sophomoric' is the liberal word for funny.
author: Michael O'Donoghue

quote: Humor brings insight and tolerance. Irony brings a deeper and less friendly understanding.
author: Agnes Repplier

quote: Set your compass to beauty, humor, and grief; stay the course no matter what, and I'll support you with everything I've got.
author: Chris Jordan

quote: Funny is a good foil. Humor is illuminating, and it also gives you power.
author: J. Tillman

quote: The values transmitted through oral history are many - courage, selflessness, the ability to endure, and to do so with humor and grace. I got those values listening to my dad's stories about the Depression and how their family survived. It gave me courage that I, too, could survive hard times.
author: Ann Turner

quote: So once I thought of the villain with a sense of humor, I began to think of a name and the name "the Joker" immediately came to mind. There was the association with the Joker in the deck of cards, and I probably yelled literally, 'Eureka!' because I knew I had the name and the image at the same time.
author: Jerry Robinson

quote: If you look at 'The Best Man,' there's a lot of humor in that, but I never consider that movie a comedy. I felt that it was a drama with comedic elements and comedic parts to it.
author: Malcolm D. Lee

quote: I value humor, kindness, and the ability to tell a good story far more than money, status, or the kind of car someone drives.
author: Rebecca Wells

quote: Humor is the most precious gift I can give to my reader, a reminder that the world is not such a terribly serious place. There is more than video games and drugs and nuclear threats; there is laughter, and there is hope.
author: James Howe

quote: Nothing in man is more serious than his sense of humor; it is the sign that he wants all the truth.
author: Mark Van Doren

quote: Magoo's appeal lies in our hostility toward an older generation. But he's not only nearsighted physically. His mind is selective of what it sees, too. That is where the humor, the satire lies, in the difference between what he thinks he sees and reality as we see it.
author: Jim Backus

quote: I like George Carlin's jokes. I like his humor. He's one of my heroes, and I like what he did with talking about everyday things.
author: Steven Wright

quote: Humor is the most engaging cowardice.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Humor is the first of the gifts to perish in a foreign tongue.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: I'm a comedian, and I definitely see the humor in a lot of things. I am also sad a lot. I cry often and easily. I think you're supposed to feel all kinds of things.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: I wasn't close to my father, but I wanted to be all my life. He had a funny sense of humor, and he laughed all the time - good and loud, like I do. He was a gay Irish gentleman and very good-looking. And he wanted to be close to me, too, but we never had much time together.
author: Judy Garland

quote: Any man who has had the job I've had and didn't have a sense of humor wouldn't still be here.
author: Harry S Truman

quote: I think a sense of humor will help get a girl out of a dark place.
author: Twyla Tharp

quote: I like bawdy humor. I love bawdy humor, but not dirty humor.
author: Betty White

quote: Through humor, you can soften some of the worst blows that life delivers. And once you find laughter, no matter how painful your situation might be, you can survive it.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: I make fun of situations and try and find the humor in things, but it's never at the expense of the other guy.
author: Bob Uecker

quote: Wit and playfulness represent a desperately serious transcendence of evil. Humor is both a form of wisdom and a means of survival.
author: Tom Robbins

quote: The comic is the perception of the opposite; humor is the feeling of it.
author: Umberto Eco

quote: I just like playing interesting, complex, complicated characters. I like films that also have an element of humor.
author: Steve Buscemi

quote: The only way I could get comfortable around people was to make them laugh. I was an obedient girl, and humor was my one form of rebellion. I used comedy to deflect. Like, 'Hey, check out my zit!' - you know, making fun of yourself before someone else has a chance to.
author: Tina Fey

quote: I want to have fun. Life ain't no dress rehearsal. I want to have fun. I'm a comedian; I ain't no politician. So everything I do is with humor, with love.
author: Bernie Mac

quote: I have five boys in the family, and it's constant competition, sport, humor, and practical jokes.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: I don't know how many sacred cows there are today. I think there's a little confusion between humor and gross passing for humor. That's kind of regrettable.
author: Bob Newhart

quote: Using no control and using humor will build a relationship and make a dent to where the client puts the counselor in their quality world and then begins to relate and seek out the counselor. Effective therapy begins with the acceptance of the therapist into the client's quality world.
author: William Glasser

quote: I'm just very amused by five-year-old humor.
author: Kesha

quote: I suppose I miss the British cynicism and the humor.
author: Rod Stewart

quote: Women respond to comfort and a sense of humor. I was always able to make them laugh, so that helps a lot.
author: Peter Dinklage

quote: You find out in life that people really like you funny. So what do you give 'em? Humor. And then if you show them the other side, they don't like you as much. I find, too, that I can hide behind the idiot's mask being funny, and you never see the sorrow or the pain.
author: Terry Bradshaw

quote: I like to deal with EVERY aspect of our condition, and that means terror and humor in equal mix. Some books have more room for humor than others.
author: Dean Koontz

quote: I've learned to start from a really sound argument, boil down the essence of what you're trying to say, then build your humor around that, rather than starting with, 'This sounds funny,' and going from there.
author: Hasan Minhaj

quote: It's easier to sit there and say you don't like feminists because they don't have a sense of humor.
author: Joan Jett

quote: I do find things funny. When you see life through the eyes of someone with a good sense of humor, which my grandmother did, life is a human comedy.
author: George Takei

quote: Comedy, we may say, is society protecting itself - with a smile.
author: J. B. Priestley

quote: Tony and I had a good on and off screen relationship, we are two very different people, but we did share a sense of humor, we now live in different parts of the world but when we find ourselves in the same place it is more or less as if there had been no years in between.
author: Roger Moore

quote: I've always had a sick sense of humor, and I've always wanted that to permeate the music because I don't take myself seriously. I take the music seriously, but I know I'm not God's gift to anyone except my mom.
author: Josh Homme

quote: I've hung on for a long time in this business and had some success, and I think it's keeping an open mind and being curious and having a sense of humor about oneself that's important.
author: Adam West

quote: Every time I've done comedy in, like, traditional comedy clubs, there's always these comedians that do really well with audiences but that the other comedians hate because they're just, you know, doing kind of cheap stuff like dancing around or doing, like, very kind of base sex humor a lot, and stuff like that.
author: Aziz Ansari

quote: I love poking fun at myself. I have a rather mean sense of humor.
author: Alton Brown

quote: You see, that's another thing that my parents gave me: an enormously great sense of humor.
author: Liza Minnelli

quote: If you get a diagnosis, get on a therapy, keep a good attitude and keep your sense of humor.
author: Teri Garr

quote: Confidence and a good sense of humor can usually win a chick over.
author: Danny McBride

quote: One of my pet peeves is that sometimes the talents of my band get overlooked because, and it was the same problem that Frank Zappa had, with a lot of groups that use humor, people don't realize there's a lot of craft behind the comedy.
author: Al Yankovic

quote: My humor is traced with dark - I've got dark patches all over the place.
author: Albert Brooks

quote: The satirist shoots to kill while the humorist brings his prey back alive and eventually releases him again for another chance.
author: Peter De Vries

quote: You can't do anything to be funny. That's cringeworthy. If your humor comes out of a place of love every time, you don't make the joke bigger than you. The funniest comedians are in touch with their emotional level.
author: John Krasinski

quote: There are just certain things that turn my head. It may be a girl's sense of humor, it may be her wit, or her belief system; it could be a lot of different things.
author: Jensen Ackles

quote: Justice Scalia was a lion of the law. Agree or disagree with him, all of his colleagues on the bench shared his wisdom and his humor. And like them, I miss him.
author: Neil Gorsuch

quote: I majored in extracurriculars, honestly. I joined the Harvard Stand Up Comedy Society, which is a ragtag band of misfits. I wrote for 'On Harvard Time,' which was a student TV show trying to be 'The Daily Show.' And I wrote a humor column for 'The Crimson' starting my sophomore year.
author: Alexandra Petri

quote: There are psychological repercussions to illness and we need a little more help to get through the effects not only on the afflicted but on the family. And I think there's even a place for humor in that.
author: Alan Thicke

quote: What's lovely about 'Eureka' is that it's a sci-fi show, but it's not monsters from outer space; it's not craziness from outer space. It's just about this community of people and what they do. These geniuses have sometimes done wonderful things and sometimes created global warming. It has this wonderful left-of-center sense of humor.
author: Joe Morton

quote: It used to take me forever to read and comprehend stuff, so I decided not to make the 'Captain Underpants' books too challenging. Don't get me wrong - the humor and ideas are often sophisticated - but the books aren't hard to read. I wanted kids who hate reading to find these books irresistible.
author: Dav Pilkey

quote: I have a sense of humor, and sometimes it gets me into trouble.
author: Duncan Jones

quote: From the ages of 12 to 35 my body, not my mind, was my primary currency. My ideas, my humor, my curiosity - none of those were valued as much as my body, which preceded me into almost every room.
author: Amanda de Cadenet

quote: ESPN is all meat and potatoes. It's pretty much scouting reports. There isn't a great deal of humor, and when there is, it's pretty sophomoric.
author: Frank Deford

quote: The love of truth lies at the root of much humor.
author: Robertson Davies

quote: Humor is a social lubricant that helps us get over some of the bad spots.
author: Steve Allen

quote: I think in my case, I had no choice but to have a good sense of humor. I grew up with my dad, Danny Thomas, and George Burns and Bob Hope and Milton Berle and Sid Caesar and all those guys were at our house all the time and telling jokes and making each other laugh.
author: Marlo Thomas

quote: The rejection that we all take and the sadness and the aggravation and the loss of jobs and all of the things that we live through in our lives, without a sense of humor, I don't know how people make it.
author: Marlo Thomas

quote: From sixteen to twenty, all women, kept in humor by their hopes and by their attractions, appear to be good-natured.
author: Samuel Richardson

quote: Humor does not diminish the pain - it makes the space around it get bigger.
author: Allen Klein

quote: Humor can help you cope with the unbearable so that you can stay on the bright side of things until the bright side actually comes along.
author: Allen Klein

quote: Today's business and health care climate may not be pleasant. Cutbacks, pay cuts and layoffs do not make anyone's job easy. But that does not mean that the humor need stop.
author: Allen Klein

quote: Sometimes the only way to make palatable that which is appalling and apprehensive is to season it with some humor.
author: Terrence Howard

quote: A taste for irony has kept more hearts from breaking than a sense of humor, for it takes irony to appreciate the joke which is on oneself.
author: Jessamyn West

quote: A lot of my humor does come from anger. It's like, you're not gonna pull one over on me - which is pretty much my motto anyways.
author: Courteney Cox

quote: Humor can prove to be the conversational lubricant you need to remove the tension from the most unpleasant management- and accountability-related conversations.
author: Clay Clark

quote: Ontologically, chocolate raises profoundly disturbing questions: Does not chocolate offer natural revelation of the goodness of the Creator just as chilies disclose a divine sense of humor? Is the human born with an innate longing for chocolate? Does the notion of chocolate preclude the concept of free will?
author: David Augsburger

quote: To me, Ann Romney sounds like a better candidate than her husband. She put her MS into remission through horseback riding, alternative therapies, and a healthy diet. She knows how to pace herself. She has a sense of humor and an innate honesty, and her hair moves in the wind. Maybe she should run.
author: Patti Davis

quote: I think that some books are more successful than others to certain readers. People who read my books for the humor, they're going to love one book. People who read my books for the mystery, they might not like that book quite as much.
author: Janet Evanovich

quote: You can get through very serious and sometimes horrible and sometimes embarrassing and very awkward situations with humor. It gives us a way out.
author: Janet Evanovich

quote: Men live by intervals of reason under the sovereignty of humor and passion.
author: Thomas Browne

quote: I wasn't the sharpest tool in the shed, and I wasn't the biggest, so I got real good at running my mouth and making people laugh and using humor as a way to not get into fights.
author: Rob Riggle

quote: I'm an off-the-charts introvert. To me, being around groups of strangers is exhausting. I've had to sort of train myself to think about two tactics: finding common ground and invoking humor.
author: Sam Yagan

quote: I consider myself to have a decent sense of humor. What's life without a sense of humor?
author: Mayer Hawthorne

quote: Humor is rare in science fiction... there's so little of it that it automatically reminds you of other heroes with that acerbic humor when you find it.
author: John Scalzi

quote: Jerry Seinfeld is amazing in many ways, not the least of them his ability to find humor, and convincing us to find it, too, in the million-and-two details about modern life that under different circumstances might send us into paroxysms of rage.
author: Tom Shales

quote: It's amazing how these little guys can say things that a mortal human could never get away with. There's some sort of unspoken license... when outlandish things come out of an inanimate object, somehow it equals humor.
author: Jeff Dunham

quote: Bathroom humor, fart, and poo poo humor in movies gets a laugh. It's a pretty easy audience, and that's been around for ages.
author: Selma Blair

quote: If somebody is not on the same page with me humor wise, I can't give them that.
author: Stephan Pastis

quote: Brits have a better sense of humor in most ways. It's darker, more cutting.
author: Stephan Pastis

quote: I still haven't found the humor in getting hit by a cement truck. My knees still hurt when I think about it, so no jokes about that yet.
author: Adam DeVine

quote: I'm a big fan of gallows humor. When my aunt passed away, she was in a coma for a day before my cousins pulled the plug. And the amount of joking and base humor that went on that day around her bed was so insane. It's crazy how people talk when something horrible is happening.
author: Amanda Peet

quote: There's such an odd, eclectic group of people that make up the town of Plymouth, New Hampshire. I don't think I could avoid not coming out of there with a pretty good sense of humor.
author: Eliza Coupe

quote: I have a really dry sense of humor. I don't think it's funny when people wink at the camera. That's more of an actor thing, just committing to whatever the thing is.
author: Topher Grace

quote: I manage through a sense of humor. We all work hard, and work has to be a really interesting, fun place. And that has to start at the top.
author: Carol Bartz

quote: But if you read Jane Austen, you know that she had a wicked sense of humor. Not only was she funny, but her early writing was very dark and had a gothic tone to it.
author: Seth Grahame-Smith

quote: My mom taught me the power of love. I learned to focus on the long-term big picture from my father. His sense of humor and light-hearted approach always make me smile. My husband is a pivotal anchor in my life. His influence encourages me to be independent and take risks.
author: Padmasree Warrior

quote: Guys usually like my sense of humor, and I am pretty down to earth. And I'm a driven person.
author: Kreayshawn

quote: As people, we're generally optimistic, no matter how disabled our lives are, and we find the humor in the darkest situations.
author: John Wells

quote: Humor distorts nothing, and only false gods are laughed off their earthly pedestals.
author: Agnes Repplier

quote: We are not actually in charge of life, yet behave as if we are the masters of our own destiny. The realization of this fact is quite a hard one. The ridiculousness of our pomposity and presumption can only result in anger or humor.
author: Billy Childish

quote: Humor is imperative, more important than food. You have a choice when someone dies. You can lie down or get back into life. Do something for someone else.
author: Doris Roberts

quote: I look at things logically. The humor I do is to go from A to B to C to D, and F is the funny.
author: Ron Shock

quote: Since I became a knitting humor writer, I seem to be understood a little better - at least for the purposes of social discourse.
author: Stephanie Pearl-McPhee

quote: I would love to do a film with a lot of humor in it: a comedy with pain instead of a painful film with some comedy.
author: Randa Haines

quote: Comedy has to be based on truth. You take the truth and you put a little curlicue at the end.
author: Sid Caesar

quote: The great thing about university is that they incline you to get up and do it, from the Classics to modern plays, to the humor that Monty Pythons made popular.
author: Michael York

quote: The people I mixed with in Monaco didn't relate to my South African mentality or humor... Although I have met some wonderful people since I've been living in Monaco, I regard them all as acquaintances. I only have two people I consider friends here.
author: Charlene, Princess of Monaco

quote: A sense of humor saves your life, and being able to make friends wherever you go.
author: Jason O'Mara

quote: So, I'm thinking of a name for a villain that has a sense of humor. I thought of 'The Joker' as a name, and as soon as I thought that, I associate it with the playing card, as my family had a tradition of champion playing; my brother was a contract champion bridge player. There were always cards around the house.
author: Jerry Robinson

quote: There is humor in the specter of the worst disaster in our nation's history. All I have to do is sweep away the debris of shock to find it.
author: Will Durst

quote: I think superheroes are heroes with flaws, and in their flaws, there is a sense of humor.
author: Peter Segal

quote: I don't think you can define how you acquire your imagination any more than you can define why one person has a sense of humor and another doesn't. But I certainly would lean to the side that says all those solitary hours of daydreaming were a kind of training for poetry.
author: James Tate

quote: I can't live without a sense of humor. I need to be laughing and entertained at all times.
author: Carlos Ponce

quote: Comedy is so hard to do, so it was very cool to do dead pan humor.
author: Brittany Daniel

quote: As I write, I control my anxiety and anguish thanks to the invaluable aid of irony and humor. But every night I am subdued by an anxiety that knows no irony, and I must wait until the next day to rediscover the blend of anguish and humor that characterizes my writing and that generates my style.
author: Enrique Vila-Matas

quote: You know those things that you throw the twigs into and it spits them out? That's what I do. The branches are like life, and I throw them into my head and some of it comes out as humor.
author: Steven Wright

quote: I think I have always had a little humor.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Teasing and a sense of humor, if you can develop that in your kids, and if you can exercise it with the kids, just makes for a pleasanter atmosphere.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: I think that humor has become a principle means of communication among Americans about politics.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: My daughter doesn't even get my humor. She's like, 'Um, no. I don't get it, Dad. Mmm, no, not that one, Dad.'
author: Kevin Hart

quote: The difference between me as Brian Warner or Marilyn Manson is just words. Same personality, sensibility, sense of humor, behavior. He is me.
author: Marilyn Manson

quote: Different taste in jokes is a great strain on the affections.
author: George Eliot

quote: Nobody enjoys the 'little show about nothing' humor more than me, but that is never the way I look at it.
author: Jerry Seinfeld

quote: A sense of humor is great - it goes a long, long way in a marriage.
author: Chris Rock

quote: Going to AA helped me to see that there were other people who had problems that had found a way to talk about them and find relief and humor through that.
author: Carrie Fisher

quote: And I loved Fats Waller. I love his instrumental abilities, his vocal abilities and his sense of humor.
author: Paul McCartney

quote: The thing that I fear discriminating against is humor and truth.
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: Women, as they grow older, rely more and more on cosmetics. Men, as they grow older, rely more and more on a sense of humor.
author: George Jean Nathan

quote: My mother was very funny. My dad had a great sense of humor. My grandmother, too.
author: Carol Burnett

quote: I've got a great sense of humor, and if I'm able to say or do something in a movie that people feel like they want to repeat, that's hugely flattering.
author: Matthew McConaughey

quote: Humor has justly been regarded as the finest perfection of poetic genius.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: True humor springs not more from the head than from the heart. It is not contempt; its essence is love. It issues not in laughter, but in still smiles, which lie far deeper.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: If this humor be the safety of our race, then it is due largely to the infusion into the American people of the Irish brain.
author: William Howard Taft

quote: I guess, for me, I've always thought that there was humor everywhere. And as a kid, I just, you know, I grew up an only child, and I - sort of nothing made me happier than to make my parents laugh. I remember I had costumes and things laying around the house that I was, you know, anything that I could do to make my parents laugh.
author: Justin Timberlake

quote: One of the great things about the Internet is that you can read what everybody has to say about everything. It is fascinating to me, the critiques about humor by people who have no sense of humor.
author: Matt Groening

quote: I have a very dark sense of humor. I swear. I have a very playful relationship with Jesus.
author: Anne Lamott

quote: A sense of humor keen enough to show a man his own absurdities will keep him from the commission of all sins, or nearly all, save those worth committing.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: I've got a great sense of humor.
author: Anthony Hopkins

quote: Our records, if you have a dark sense of humor, were funny, but our records weren't about comedy. They were about protests, fantasy, confrontation and all that.
author: Ice Cube

quote: Humor is richly rewarding to the person who employs it. It has some value in gaining and holding attention, but it has no persuasive value at all.
author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quote: Humor is a serious thing. I like to think of it as one of our greatest earliest natural resources, which must be preserved at all cost.
author: James Thurber

quote: The nation that complacently and fearfully allows its artists and writers to become suspected rather than respected is no longer regarded as a nation possessed with humor or depth.
author: James Thurber

quote: There is also this benefit in brag, that the speaker is unconsciously expressing his own ideal. Humor him by all means, draw it all out, and hold him to it.
author: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: A lot of people can find something to laugh at in my humor, I guess.
author: Ron White

quote: Well, I mean, if a joke or humor is bawdy, it's got to be funny enough to warrant it. You can't just have it bawdy or dirty just for the sake of being that - it's got to be funny.
author: Betty White

quote: You can turn painful situations around through laughter. If you can find humor in anything, even poverty, you can survive it.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: George Carlin is brilliant with words, and Johnny Winters is very creative. It's taking something common and drawing out the humor, being clever with words.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: I mean, yeah, I'm sure that Python and the other things have paved the way for a greater understanding of the British sense of humor, but I don't think it's all that different than the American sense of humor.
author: Simon Pegg

quote: Half the battle is that people have to like you before you say one joke, one bit of humor.
author: Don Rickles

quote: I don't try to sanction other people's joy in monsters. I mean, I think the fact is, humor, fantasy - you know, like fear, desire or laughter - create genres of their own: comedy, melodrama, or erotic films or horror films... The boundaries cannot be defined. It's to each his own.
author: Guillermo del Toro

quote: Life is never all one thing. It bounces around. Certainly, my own life has. Look at Woody Allen's funny movies - all the humor comes out of sad stuff. Sometimes you have to laugh, no matter what life deals you.
author: Tim O'Brien

quote: Love, as wonderful and horrible as it is, has at its center a kind of pitiful humor.
author: Tim O'Brien

quote: Since the very beginning, Emeril's had a sense of humor about me calling him names and poking fun at him.
author: Anthony Bourdain

quote: It doesn't take many people to have a bad sense of humor to get in trouble at a corporation.
author: Scott Adams

quote: Whatever else an American believes or disbelieves about himself, he is absolutely sure he has a sense of humor.
author: E. B. White

quote: I'm very confident that Nick Hornby always gets it right as a writer. He has the vernacular and passion. He is adroit and dry, and balances humor with the humanity of life.
author: Pierce Brosnan

quote: I personally have dealt with any adversity in my life with humor. That's why I told America to 'Read my hips!' on 'Dancing With the Stars' or was happy to play along with Jason Alexander and Jerry Seinfeld in the great restaurant scene on 'Seinfeld.'
author: Marlee Matlin

quote: Humor comes in all forms, and everyone has their cup of tea about what makes them laugh. But the day we censor humor is a sad one for sure.
author: Marlee Matlin

quote: There's a certain type of character that you can't help but come in contact with growing up and living in Brooklyn and Long Island. A certain mixture of moxie, heart, and a wise guy sense of humor.
author: Steve Buscemi

quote: I read the script and decide if a particular character looks fun to play. I look for complexity and a sense of humor. Those are crucial, real things to life.
author: Steve Buscemi

quote: My wife, my daughters, even my grandchildren are funny. You've got to keep a sense of humor because anger destroys you.
author: Michael Caine

quote: Every black film feels like it's Tyler Perry, and that just needs to stop. But people seem to slowly be looking for what else is out there - 'Is there something else besides this type of humor?' 'I'm tired of seeing men in dresses.'
author: Issa Rae

quote: Who I was was not acceptable to black L.A. youth: the way I spoke and my sense of humor. Everybody else had relaxers and pressed hair. I wore my hair in an Afro puff. Nappy. The way I dressed. It was all about name brands at the time in L.A. I had no idea. All those things, I failed miserably at.
author: Issa Rae

quote: I've been encouraging documentary filmmakers to use more and more humor, and they're loath to do that because they think if it's a documentary it has to be deadly serious - it has to be like medicine that you're supposed to take. And I think it's what keeps the mass audience from going to documentaries.
author: Michael Moore

quote: Anyone who knows me, and most of my fans, know that I have a sense of humor.
author: Glenn Danzig

quote: A lot of people into Tool, for some reason, are not interested in humor.
author: Maynard James Keenan

quote: I've met a lot of people who've lost their jobs and they still have a sense of humor.
author: Louis C. K.

quote: Humor has to surprise us; otherwise, it isn't funny. It's a death knell for a writer to be labeled a humorist because then it's not a surprise anymore.
author: Garrison Keillor

quote: The humor section is the last place an author wants to be. They put your stuff next to collections of Cathy cartoons.
author: David Sedaris

quote: There is something really horrific for any human being who feels he is being consumed by other people. I'm talking about a writer's critics, who don't address what you've written, but want to probe into your existence and magnify the trivia of your life without any sense of humor, without any sense of context.
author: Wole Soyinka

quote: I'm not a particularly dark individual. I have my moments, it's true, but I do have a sense of humor.
author: Alan Moore

quote: The total absence of humor from the Bible is one of the most singular things in all literature.
author: Alfred North Whitehead

quote: And, you know, I liked writing humor. Well, I should say, I wanted to write seriously, but it kept turning funny.
author: Roseanne Barr

quote: Why anybody gets my sense of humor I never know, but I do know that when they do, I keep them as close as I possibly can.
author: Joss Whedon

quote: I never write anything without humor, just because I like humor, but at the same time, it is a way for anything fantastical to become relatable.
author: Joss Whedon

quote: With Ricky Gervais, it's all shades of wrong, it's my kind of humor.
author: Emily Blunt

quote: The best way to make your audience laugh is to start laughing yourself.
author: Oliver Goldsmith

quote: I remember when humor was gentle pokes. I used to call it 'arm around the shoulder' humor. Now they go for the jugular and they take no prisoners. It's mean, mean stuff.
author: Robert Orben

quote: President Ford used humor a great deal.
author: Robert Orben
