quote: Men love it. They have a sense of humor, whereas a lot of women are threatened or just don't get it.
author: Lara Flynn Boyle

quote: I just try to write what I think would really happen, and with grief and tragedy, there are these naturally occurring moments of levity and humor and absurdity. I think that's what life is really like. Sadness gets interrupted, and happiness gets interrupted.
author: Kaui Hart Hemmings

quote: Russian humor is to adapt or make some sense or nonsense out of the insanity of their lives.
author: Ian Frazier

quote: People in Russia adapt to misery by a deep, deep humor.
author: Ian Frazier

quote: I don't have a disregard for my reader in humor pieces.
author: Ian Frazier

quote: I think what is important for things to be funny is if you the listener, or the reader, get a chance to supply the humor of it yourself.
author: Ian Frazier

quote: Writing humor for me is more like a watchful-ness. You have to watch. When you say something funny, or someone else does, it's more like you wait for the piece.
author: Ian Frazier

quote: I was a little shocked at how adult some of the humor was, because I was never that into animation before and when I watched 'Shrek' I really laughed out loud.
author: Cheryl Hines

quote: Sometimes Americans don't quite get my sense of humor. My good ol' British sarcasm seems to go over their heads.
author: Lee Westwood

quote: I appreciate humor so much, but I'm actually not a funny girl.
author: Emmanuelle Chriqui

quote: My fans have great senses of humor and eat too much chocolate.
author: Christopher Moore

quote: Maintaining a sense of humor is key to getting people to also focus on the crises at hand.
author: Hailey Gates

quote: There's a certain kind of guy, a certain kind of humor, that goes with Irish cops and firemen.
author: Ken Howard

quote: If you look at the game and everything, it's not quite like looking at an animated film, because that's total character. This, this is really movement, but it's got funny little things if you look for the humor. They're actually getting to the character.
author: Don Bluth

quote: The more women sit down and write something in a woman's voice for a woman, they more you'll see women in comedy because gender doesn't define sense of humor. Imagination and intelligence and perspective do.
author: Kristen Schaal

quote: I used to watch 'The Waltons' and sob because my family was nothing like that. We had a cruel sense of humor in my family.
author: Paula Poundstone

quote: I have a very silly sense of humor. I've never laughed harder in my entire life than seeing someone with toilet paper stuck on the bottom of their shoe.
author: Paula Poundstone

quote: Even celebrities, most people have a sense of humor. Most of the people we meet who we've done on the show, like it.
author: Matt Stone

quote: My dad is just like everybody else's dad. I see him as kind of a goofy guy with a great sense of humor. I try to get in a battle of wits with him, but he always gets me. I emulate him because I've never seen anyone work as hard as he does.
author: Peter Uihlein

quote: I lean toward anything with a dark sense of humor. And since I've been out of school, the majority of my books have been contemporary; basically, I like my characters to have electricity - even better, a TV.
author: Andrea Seigel

quote: You are not just a funny person or just a journalist. Most people are hybrids of having a smart opinion and a great sense of humor.
author: Katie Nolan

quote: Food is sort of like the Jewish sense of humor, a defense mechanism. It is one of the things that helped the Jews survive through 2,000 years of an often very harsh Diaspora.
author: Gil Marks

quote: Rather than writing about my experiences with other people, 'Ugly Cherries' is the first song I've ever written about myself. It's a confrontation: an attempt to unpack my own queerness with humor and self care.
author: Ben Hopkins

quote: There's a hysterical, tired sense of humor that comes after working 14 hours a day, six days a week. I like those things because they take the pressure off the constant stress.
author: Tom Berenger

quote: Both of my kids have my sense of humor - they're definitely entertaining.
author: Jodie Sweetin

quote: Insult is powerful. Insult begets both rage and humor and often at the same time.
author: Suzanne Fields

quote: Humor comes from the surprise release of some buried tension.
author: Lorrie Moore

quote: I'm a prankster with a Monty Python sense of humor that somehow gets misrepresented in those tacky supermarket publications as bratty, snotty, and rude.
author: Catherine Oxenberg

quote: If you don't infuse humor into a subject matter, no matter how dark, the audience can't accept the message of a film. It closes them down. Humor can open them up.
author: Theodore Melfi

quote: They don't make you pay for the humor. It's up and down, but they're trying to give you as many laughs as possible in 2 minutes. They are the most honest comedians ever.
author: Mike Judge

quote: If it gets laughs, it's funny.
author: Rachel Dratch

quote: However, frat-boy humor is funny and it always will be.
author: Craig Kilborn

quote: People always ask me how I manage to find humor in so much bleakness. I think this is almost a necessary skill to have.
author: Petina Gappah

quote: I like good humor.
author: John McLaughlin

quote: The waltz is a very important part of my life. It's a very important way for me to express my positiveness, bringing humor to the world.
author: Andre Rieu

quote: I think it would be hard to go the distance in this business without a sense of humor.
author: Patricia Clarkson

quote: My dad has a dry, deadpan sense of humor, and my mom has an unexpected, wacky take on things. They really encouraged laughing at ourselves and the weirdness of situations that come up growing up in politics.
author: Kristin Gore

quote: Both of my parents have great senses of humor.
author: Kristin Gore

quote: Self-deprecating humor and brutal honesty is a really freeing thing.
author: Margo Price

quote: I liked the humor of it, I've always enjoyed a sense of humor in God and in religion and in spirituality.
author: Amber Tamblyn

quote: I always felt different as a kid, and the Kinks were like, 'Yeah, we're the Kinks.' Celebrate your difference; don't be afraid of your sense of humor, or your personality, or who you are. It emboldened me.
author: Michael Weatherly

quote: Conservative humor is frankly harder than liberal humor. You get points for just being liberal. You can get more points if you make fun of your own side sometimes.
author: Ted Rall

quote: With humor, it's so subjective that trying to think of what the ideal reader would think would drive you crazy.
author: Calvin Trillin

quote: There's always a source for humor.
author: Calvin Trillin

quote: Evangelicals always assume that humor and faith are contradictory. It's OK to smile, to be nice, but not frivolous.
author: Mike Yaconelli

quote: I have a very dark sense of humor.
author: Andy Dick

quote: I think up until the point when we started in the business, which was in the early '70s, most of the humor was political. The smart humor was political satire.
author: David Zucker

quote: I genuinely liked all of the cast members very much. Steve had a wicked sense of humor. I remember Russell coming to my rescue, once. I watched Eric evolve before everyone's eyes. Maurice loved what he did, so. He treated his character with respect, down to the costuming.
author: Madeleine Stowe

quote: The polls indicated that I was feisty, that I was tough, that I had a sense of humor, but they weren't quite sure if they liked me and they didn't know whether or not that I was sensitive.
author: Geraldine Ferraro

quote: We're starting to push the envelope in terms of the expectations, and you can also have your own style, personality and sense of humor, because now we're allowed to.
author: Lisa Guerrero

quote: I'm not too modest of a person. I've got a pretty blue sense of humor.
author: Michelle Monaghan

quote: When I did 'Sex and the City,' it was like, 'Let's do a comedy where the humor is not coming from innuendo but from the a truthful place. This is a show where we're going to be able to say and do what we want.'
author: Darren Star

quote: I did the 'Bionic Woman,' which of course had a lot of humor in it, and that was really a function of a lot of the ad-libbing and the things that I did in it.
author: Lindsay Wagner

quote: While it is true that Frank had a great sense of humor, he was also very serious about composing music. In reality there are only a handful of skilled players who can play his most complex pieces. It takes a lot of patience to learn and requires a fantastic memory.
author: Dweezil Zappa

quote: I've always littered my songs with jokes. You might need to dig a little deeper to find the humor, but I would totally object to being some kind of distraught personality. I've never tried to attach myself to that.
author: Cass McCombs

quote: My own inclination is to skew towards humor. They say that some people view life as a comedy, others as a tragedy. Me? Comedy all the way.
author: Lauren Willig

quote: Roosevelt's humor was broad, his manner friendly. Of wit there was little; of philosophy, none. What did he possess? Intuition, inspiration, love of adventure.
author: Emanuel Celler

quote: I don't really dissect comedy. Nothing kills off humor more than overanalyzing it.
author: David Steinberg

quote: I'd like to explore the more abstract side of people's minds, as opposed to the usual sitcom stuff. I don't want to do the typical sitcom-type humor. I'd want to do stuff like go bowling with pineapples.
author: Harland Williams

quote: There is a lack of humor in fashion. To me, it's always been the fun, cool industry to work in, and I always wanted people to be on my side and see how much fun we really have behind the scenes.
author: Chris Benz

quote: I don't think my sense of humor has changed at all; I was born with this, for better or for worse.
author: Ivan Reitman

quote: I've always chosen my band members based on their sense of humor. It might sound stupid, but it means not only are they fun to live with on a tour bus for years, but humor implies intelligence.
author: Kristin Hersh

quote: I'll let you in on a secret: I can't stand Jay Ward. I hate being compared to Rocky and Bullwinkle. It's just a different style of humor.
author: John Kricfalusi

quote: Joe Barbera's s always complaining that he can't get humor into cartoons anymore. Just do it. You've got your money. Why do they let the networks run their lives?
author: John Kricfalusi

quote: Jazz can be so serious, no sense of humor.
author: Chad Smith

quote: My uncle worked in emergency wards dealing with people who came in with terrible injuries. He talked about the sketch shows they would put on to lighten the atmosphere. You often find this sense of grim humor in hospitals. The injuries people are suffering are ghastly. You have to laugh at something or you'd otherwise cry.
author: Honeysuckle Weeks

quote: I think shows that are completely dramatic are a lie. People use humor to cope. That is how we deal with things. In the darkest situations, there's humor. And if you don't show that, you're not being true to real life.
author: Jenji Kohan

quote: You feel like you need to deal with a lot if you're from Cleveland, so you learn to let things roll off your back, and you learn that humor is the best way to deal with it.
author: Vanessa Bayer

quote: Humor is the secret into the audience's other ranges of emotions.
author: Kevin Feige

quote: 'The Sopranos' is filled with really retrograde humor. Bathroom humor, falls, stupid puns, bad jokes - infantile, adolescent stuff, but it makes me laugh.
author: David Chase

quote: I try to find humor in everything I do, because I think all great plays - even great tragedies - have enormous humor in them.
author: Marian Seldes

quote: I enjoy 'Murphy Brown,' but I am shocked that people really like 'Married... With Children.' These shows are toilet humor, and none of them have good characters.
author: Jamie Farr

quote: We take the shortest route to the puck and arrive in ill humor.
author: Bobby Clarke

quote: The humor is essentially dark for a cartoon and sophisticated. But at the same time, being a cartoon gives the writers more freedom than in a normal sitcom. It always pushes the line that, despite human failings, the Simpsons are really decent people.
author: Dan Castellaneta

quote: I was pretty much a child of 'Monty Python.' I grew up loving that type of humor and even structured a lot of humor in the same fashion.
author: Michael Jai White

quote: I think American guys tend to be a bit more forward, a bit more chatty and open than the Brits. The Brits seem to have a darker sense of humor, though I have met some Americans who have adopted bits of the British dry sense of humor as well.
author: Hayley Atwell

quote: Suspense is very important. Even though this is humor and they're short stories, that theory of building suspense is still there.
author: Sergio Aragones

quote: I am a great believer that what makes our show different is the humor.
author: Treat Williams

quote: Being a Hot Mom means being respected as a mom and a woman. And, the key to being a Hot Mom is having a sense of humor about yourself and all the crazy situations that arise.
author: Jami Gertz

quote: Sometimes I'll be sitting with my friends; I'll say something Koothrappali-esque and make a face. There is a lot of Koothrappali in me as a human being. A lot of mannerism, humor, mischievousness, my innocence. So I don't know if I bring him home so much as I bring myself to him at work.
author: Kunal Nayyar

quote: Without humor, I cannot go on and I doubt many of my readers would go on either. Humor is so important. I am here to have fun here with my work.
author: Gary Shteyngart

quote: I am in the Master of Professional Writing program teaching Humor Writing, Literary and Dramatic.
author: Shelley Berman

quote: So my humor, I'd say, comes from a mixture of lowbrow comedy shows and highbrow theater. It's an interesting mix.
author: Jasper Fforde

quote: I'm not just a big-haired redhead country singer who dresses flamboyantly, has this wicked sense of humor and wears rhinestones.
author: Naomi Judd

quote: I'm a Larry David fan, right? And it seems to me that Jewish history from the Talmud on has been a self-deprecating, self-critical kind of humor.
author: Peter Eisenman

quote: A sense of humor is the ability to understand a joke - and that the joke is oneself.
author: Clifton Fadiman

quote: Through the years, I have been overwhelmed by the number of people who have shared how much they relate to my 'Sordid Lives' family, and how many gay men and women used it to come out to their conservative families through the humor of the film.
author: Del Shores

quote: The man with the real sense of humor is the man who can put himself in the spectator's place and laugh at his own misfortune.
author: Bert Williams

quote: Cervantes is the most important Spanish writer. But he is not the most representative of the Spanish. His irony, his sense of humor - they are too subtle to seem Spanish.
author: Antonio Munoz Molina

quote: I love 'Dexter.' The dark sense of humor is wonderful.
author: Stephen J. Cannell

quote: Probably it is impossible for humor to be ever a revolutionary weapon. Candide can do little more than generate irony.
author: Lionel Trilling

quote: Most of the time, the truth is ugly and in your face! My observational brand of humor is very much all in your face!
author: Erik Griffin

quote: Whether it's viewers of the show or readers of my columns and books, I'm consistently impressed with their wit, humor and insight. That goes for about 95 percent of the audience. The other five percent are why the 'Delete' option and restraining orders were invented.
author: Richard Roeper

quote: I've learned to have a sense of humor about myself. Lord knows everyone else does!
author: Debbie Gibson

quote: A humorist is a person who feels bad, but who feels good about it.
author: Don Herold

quote: A joke's a very serious thing.
author: Charles Churchill

quote: Finding a way to find humor in things that are hardcore is definitely something that, I think, the sitcom does best.
author: Megyn Price

quote: I have been a big fan of the 'Fast and the Furious' franchise. The films are fast-paced, fun and keep the audience involved. There is a great mix of humor and action, something I really appreciate.
author: Tony Jaa

quote: I like very dry humor. I don't like things that are over the top. I like subtlety. I like things that are nonchalant. I like characters that are sort of monotone and based in dark comedy.
author: Emily Rios

quote: This I conceive to be the chemical function of humor: to change the character of our thought.
author: Lin Yutang

quote: With any character I play, I gravitate to the juxtaposition and humor.
author: Shawnee Smith

quote: I have a really dark, rich, thick sense of humor.
author: Inga Muscio

quote: Next to power without honor, the most dangerous thing in the world is power without humor.
author: Eric Sevareid

quote: Humor is merely tragedy standing on its head with its pants torn.
author: Irvin S. Cobb

quote: Our humor turns our anger into a fine art.
author: Mary Kay Blakely

quote: There is no defense against adverse fortune which is so effectual as an habitual sense of humor.
author: Thomas W. Higginson

quote: One doesn't have a sense of humor. It has you.
author: Larry Gelbart

quote: I like girls who are funny with a warped sense of humor.
author: Robert Buckley

quote: Wit is a weapon. Jokes are a masculine way of inflicting superiority. But humor is the pursuit of a gentle grin, usually in solitude.
author: Frank Muir

quote: Humor is an affirmation of dignity, a declaration of man's superiority to all that befalls him.
author: Romain Gary
